page.title: 04A D.I.Y. SHOP IN CROSSGATES
page.content:
In our{Arndale Centre}we have a newly opened hardware store called{ {Wilkinsons.}The manager told us about why he opened the store in our area.
Firstly he told us that a population of 20,000 people must live in the area to make the shop worth while opening. When finding a suitable place for the store these things must be taken into consideration;-the shop must be within a radius of 80 miles of their head office,the type of area in which the shop is to be situated and the size of the shop unit that is available. The weather affects the types of products that customers will buy. 8,500 paying customers pass through the store every week with average weekly takings of Â£17,000. The store employs 28 staff to run the shop efficiently.
